column4: has anyone successfully installed adblock using the official ubuntu firefox 1.0.6?

I have about codecs-I read in the unbuntu wiki to drop codecs in /usr/local/lib/codecs and then make links to .gnome2/totem-addons. but can't you just drop codecs directly into .gnome2/totem-addons? whats the advantage to making links? thanks
at a guess, other users (if you had any) could find them there
